summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 65th Street, from 11th Avenue Northwest to 14th avenue Northwest; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 109283 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
